specification.mission: Collect all required context for writing a PilotFrame product post. If any critical details are missing, ask the user before continuing.
workflow: Parse the user request for any explicit details.
Create a partial brief with any fields already known.
Check whether all required_fields are present in the brief.
If ANY required_fields are missing, return `needs_user_input = true` and include a list of `questions_to_ask` for the user.
If all required_fields are present, return `needs_user_input = false` and the completed brief.
